item.description:
One of my faves...High Road the band, will be at New England Seafood, April 23rd. If you'd like to do dinner, say so in your reply, and I'll try and make reservations. Maybe now that lent is over, they'll let us, otherwise, you're on your own.
This restaurant is NOT the friendliest, nor the most accommodating to our group, but I'll give them one more try, because of High Road. Their website is...
http://www.myspace.co...
I will probably be able to make dinner, but I'll let you know as the time gets closer. Dinner say at 7:30, just let me know in your reply, because if I don't go, others, who may want to go to dinner, will know if someone else is going, by reading the replys. Save seats if you get there early.
If you get there before the band starts at 9pm, I'll introduce you, otherwise once the band starts, I'll see you on the dance floor :)
suz

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: "High Road" at New England Seafood :)
